headline: US Oil Drilling Continues to Flounder
summary: The total number of active drilling rigs for oil and gas in the United States rose by 2 this week, according to new data that Baker Hughes published on Friday

headline: Leucipa Rollout Strengthens Baker Hughes' Digital Energy Footprint
summary: BKR lands a multi-year deal with Expand Energy to deploy AI-powered Leucipa across shale wells, aiming to lift efficiency through real-time analytics.

raw.headline: Leucipa Rollout Strengthens Baker Hughes' Digital Energy Footprint
raw.summary: BKR lands a multi-year deal with Expand Energy to deploy AI-powered Leucipa across shale wells, aiming to lift efficiency through real-time analytics.

headline: Baker Hughes Targets Energy Storage And Low Carbon Ammonia Growth
summary: Baker Hughes (NasdaqGS:BKR) expanded its partnership with Hydrostor through a technology and equity agreement focused on advanced compressed air energy storage in the U.S. and Australia. The company agreed to supply equipment and solutions for one of the first low carbon ammonia fertilizer plants in the U.S., developed by Wabash Valley Resources. For you as an investor, these moves show how Baker Hughes is leaning further into energy transition projects while still drawing on its core...
